description:
The Timekeepers` power sends Tohru to an unfamiliar alley. Waking up to children`s voices, he sees the Kyoka who fights for Frontier S. He’s led to the hideout of Team Bastian, where Kyoka tells Tohru about the harsh reality those in Frontier S must face.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 漂流 もう一つの世界
